group_1.narration: It's been a while@since I went to Miyu's father to ask him@not to cut off the sponsorship for this year.
The Youth Association, having decided@to go all out for this year's Fire Festival,@are making preparations little by little,@but we're doing well,@as we make do with our dwindling funds.

group_1.textLeft: Phew...@Ow, my back...

group_1.textRight: You okay?@You're really working too hard...

group_1.textLeft: This is nothing to worry about.
I can't take a day off when preparations for the@Festival are being delayed, y'know.
Plus, I gotta work hard to make up for the trouble@I caused everyone, right?

group_1.textRight: ...True, if you don't work hard enough,@we won't make it in time.

group_1.textLeft: Woah, don't say that... San...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I'm just kidding.
You can tell me if it's really hard on you, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, thanks a lot.
...Alright, I'm gonna give it one more try!

group_1.textRight: ...Lemme also give you a hand, Big Bro Tatsu!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!

group_1.textRight: Oh, excuse me for a moment...
[chara:103101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(It's from Miyabi...)

group_1.narration: I'd like to introduce you to@the new leader of the Neo-Magius, Instructor...@Will you meet us in Takarazaki City...?

group_1.textLeft: What's up? If you have something else to do,@you don't have to help me...

group_1.textRight: ...Um, well, it's okay.@It's nothing.
(I'm busy preparing for the Festival right now.)
(So if they want to come over here,@there's no reason to refuse...)
Late! They're sooo late!
Where on Earth are Miyabi and her friends@fooling around?!

group_1.textLeft: If this is it, the new leader is also a disappointment.
I might just lose my temper for the first time@in a long while...

group_1.textRight: Damnation, damnation!@Lady San's cannonballs are exploding!

group_1.textLeft: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:103101:effect_ef_adv_01]Hmm...?@Ah, the lady arrives at last...
It's quite unreasonable to be late when you're@the ones who called me.

group_1.textRight: She's right, she's right! I agree with Lady San!
"Lady San"? So, you're that instructor chick?
San Kagura plus Miyuri Yukari?

group_1.textLeft: You're the one coming to me for a favor, yet you@don't even address me with proper respect?
Rude! So rude!

group_1.textRight: Toootally no idea what you're talking aboutâ˜…
Hey, Himena...!

group_1.textLeft: This cutie is here to be on top of you all.
Why should I get down on my knees and beg?
I mean, what's with all this demonic pressure@right from the very first meeting?
...[wait:0.5][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]I don't dislike that attitude.
You've gotten yourselves a fine catch, Miyabi, Azumi.

group_1.textRight: What do you think of Himena Aika, Lady San...?

group_1.textLeft: She isn't half bad.
Though, whether or not she's able to reach the top@depends on how well she does from now on.

group_1.textRight: Grr... Personally, I don't like that impudent attitude@of hers...

group_1.textLeft: If she wasn't like that...
She wouldn't be capable of leading a group that@promotes Magical Girl supremacy.
I feel like she's got the balance just right.
(Whether Himena Aika is to be trusted depends@on the outcome of the test,)
(but the odds seem to be in my favor...)
(I won't let this chance slip by...!)

group_1.textRight: Lady San, you're happy...?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*... Don't you see?
Once the prospect of spreading Magical Girl@supremacy is established...
All that's left is to hold this year's Fire Festival.
To think that I've finally found a path to hope...@makes me happy.

group_1.textRight: Right, right!
Lady San, if you become a god and make the@Fire Festival last...
Then we'll all live happily ever after!

group_1.textLeft: To that end, let's make this year's Festival@a success for sure!

group_1.textRight: Yes, Lady San!
